task.title: How to let your icing crust
task.shortdesc: methods to let your icing crust.

taskbody.context: There are multiple methods to letting your icing crust.

step.cmd: Place in oven at 170 F for 10 minutes, then remove from oven and let cookies cool on pan.
Let icing air dry for several hours, then return later or the next day to add details.
